text: Yitzhak Ben-Zvi ( Yitshak Ben-Tsvi; 24 November 188423 April 1963) was an Israeli historian and politician. He was a Labor Zionist. From 1952 until 1963, he was the 2nd President of Israel. ==Other websites== * Yitzhak Ben-Zvi Israel Ministry of Foreign Affairs * Jewish virtual library entry Category:1884 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Presidents of Israel Category:Israeli historians
title: Yitzhak Ben-Zvi
